PHRASE.LANG: Relax, take a break, and let the cool sounds of nature sweep you into slumber. [#Legal]
Détendez-vous, prenez une pause et laissez refroidir les sons de la nature vous balayer dans le sommeil. [#Legal]
Entspanne etwas, mach eine Pause und lass dich von den Geräuschen der Natur in den Schlaf wiegen. [#Legal]
Rilassati, fermati un attimo, e lascia cullarti nel sonno dai dolci suoni della natura. [#Legal]
Relájate, descansa un poco y deja que los sonidos de la naturaleza te adormezcan. [#Legal]
Relax, take a break, and let the cool sounds of nature sweep you into slumber. [#Legal]
한 박자 쉬면서 휴식을 취하고, 시원한 자연의 소리가 여러분을 깊은 잠으로 인도하도록 하세요. [#Legal]
Relax, take a break, and let the cool sounds of nature sweep you into slumber. [#Legal]
放鬆心情，休息一下，讓大自然的樂韻伴你入睡。 [#Legal]
放鬆心情，休息一下，讓大自然的樂韻伴你入睡。 [#Legal]
Relax, take a break, and let the cool sounds of nature sweep you into slumber. [#Legal]
